headline: Uber's ALDI Deal on Grocery Delivery: Growth Thesis Strengthening?
summary: UBER's partnership with ALDI brings fresh groceries, SNAP payments and exclusive deals to Uber Eats, boosting its growing delivery segment.

headline: Best Buy Co., Inc. (BBY)’s Chairman Emeritus, Richard M. Schulze, Sells 196,100 Shares of the Company’s Common Stock at a Weighted Average Price of About $74
